sources.title: A Christmas Reunion | Full Movie | Romantic Christmas Comedy | Denise Richards | Patrick Muldoon
sources.description:
A high-flying advertising executive returns to her hometown following the death of her aunt, whose dying wish was for her niece to re-open her bakery shop and host the town's 50th annual Christmas cookie contest.
2015.  Stars: Denise Richards, Patrick Muldoon, Jake Busey

metadata.Plot: A Madison Avenue executive, Amy, discovers an unusual Christmas surprise when she inherits her Aunt's hometown bakery. The real surprise comes when she learns the other half of the bakery was left to her long-ago boyfriend, Jack. Unresolved personal issues resurface between them, as the exes return home to co-manage the store, along with its traditional holiday cookie bake-off.
metadata.Writer: Margaret Base, Mary Glenn, Sam Irvin
metadata.Actors: Denise Richards, Patrick Muldoon, Jake Busey
